languages.text: "Лорд-капитан? Но если это вы, то кто тогда на троне..." {n}Равор поворачивается в сторону самозванца и отшатывается с криком ужаса, хватается за пистолет, но... Из ушей кормчего брызжет кровь, и он рушится на пол.{/n}

"Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан? Но если это вы, то кто тогда на троне..." {n}Равор поворачивается в сторону самозванца и отшатывается с криком ужаса, хватается за пистолет, но... Из ушей кормчего брызжет кровь, и он рушится на пол.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain? But if it is you, then who is sitting on the throne..." {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a cry of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood spurts from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain? But if it is you, then who is sitting on the throne..." {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a cry of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood spurts from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain? But if it is you, then who is sitting on the throne…?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain? But if it is you, then who is sitting on the throne…?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán? Pero si usted está ahí, ¿quién ocupa el trono?» {n}Ravor se gira hacia tu doble y retrocede con un grito de terror. Se lleva la mano a la pistola, pero la sangre empieza a manar de sus orejas y se desploma en el suelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Lord Capitán? Pero si usted está ahí, ¿quién ocupa el trono?» {n}Ravor se gira hacia tu doble y retrocede con un grito de terror. Se lleva la mano a la pistola, pero la sangre empieza a manar de sus orejas y se desploma en el suelo.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？でも、こちらがあなたなら、王座に座っているのは一体…？」{n}ラヴォアは偽者の方を振り向くと恐怖で叫び、その反動で地面に倒れる。ピストルに手を伸ばしたが、耳から血が噴き出し、床に倒れ込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？でも、こちらがあなたなら、王座に座っているのは一体…？」{n}ラヴォアは偽者の方を振り向くと恐怖で叫び、その反動で地面に倒れる。ピストルに手を伸ばしたが、耳から血が噴き出し、床に倒れ込む。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: “船长老大？可如果这个才是你，王座上那家伙到底是谁？”{n}雷沃转向冒牌货，随后发出了惊恐的吼声。他伸手去拿手枪，但鲜血从他的耳朵里涌了出来，他倒在了地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “船长老大？可如果这个才是你，王座上那家伙到底是谁？”{n}雷沃转向冒牌货，随后发出了惊恐的吼声。他伸手去拿手枪，但鲜血从他的耳朵里涌了出来，他倒在了地上。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n? Aber wenn Ihr das seid, wer sitzt dann auf dem Thron?" {n}Ravor blickt {mf|den Doppelgänger|die Doppelgängerin} an und weicht mit einem entsetzten Schrei zurück. Er greift nach seiner Pistole, doch Blut beginnt aus seinen Ohren zu schießen und er sackt auf dem Boden zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n? Aber wenn Ihr das seid, wer sitzt dann auf dem Thron?" {n}Ravor blickt {mf|den Doppelgänger|die Doppelgängerin} an und weicht mit einem entsetzten Schrei zurück. Er greift nach seiner Pistole, doch Blut beginnt aus seinen Ohren zu schießen und er sackt auf dem Boden zusammen.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine} ? Mais... si c'est vous, alors qui est assis sur le trône ? » {n}Ravor se tourne vers l'{mf|imposteur|impostrice} et laisse échapper un cri avec un mouvement de recul. Alors qu'il tend la main vers son pistolet, du sang se met à jaillir de ses oreilles, et il s'effondre au sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine} ? Mais... si c'est vous, alors qui est assis sur le trône ? » {n}Ravor se tourne vers l'{mf|imposteur|impostrice} et laisse échapper un cri avec un mouvement de recul. Alors qu'il tend la main vers son pistolet, du sang se met à jaillir de ses oreilles, et il s'effondre au sol.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan? Eğer bu sizseniz tahtta oturan kim?" {n}Ravor, kopyana doğru dönüyor ve dehşetle bağırarak geri sendeliyor. Silahına uzanıyor ama kulaklarından kan fışkırmaya başlıyor, sonrasında yere yığılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n? But if it is you, then who's sitting on the throne?" {n}Ravor turns toward the impostor and recoils with a shout of terror. He reaches for his pistol, but blood begins gushing from his ears and he collapses to the floor.{/n}
